text:
Tomcat 4 does not seem to parse any tld document containing "variable" 
element (as required in JSP 1.2). 

I do not have any TagExtraInfo class defined. But I think JSP 1.2 allows us 
to use "variable" element to export script variables without using 
TagExtraInfo.

org.apache.jasper.JasperException: XML parsing error on file 
/WEB-INF/tlds/DynamicProxy.tld: (line 34, col 15): Element type "variable" 
must be declared.
creator: juntao_yuan@yahoo.com

text:
I am sorry. I was using the wrong version of DTD ... So, ignore this bug 
report please.
creator: juntao_yuan@yahoo.com
